entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
